alert.note: Alert for Bates; Henry (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 9:12AM CDT until May 15 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Henry County in west central Missouri... Southeastern Bates County in west central Missouri... * Until 1000 AM CDT. * At 912 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Holden to near Montrose to Rich Hill, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clinton, Windsor, Rich Hill, Urich, Calhoun, Deepwater, Montrose, Coal, Rockville, Brownington, Blairstown, Tightwad, Hartwell, La Due and Truman Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
